Hi!

I have a small problem. Due to the fact that I use some AOP techniques, my
code is mostly generated by AOP weaver. One side-effect is that for all
test methods the body is moved to private method and this method is called
from previous test method. The problem is that this new private method
name start also with 'test' and I get following error:

warning(junit.framework.TestSuite$1)junit.framework.AssertionFailedError:
Test method isn't public:
testPropagate5__from_model_propagation__PropagatingObjectTest

It's only a warning but it breaks my test reports.
Do you know what can I do in order to have junit ignored those methods ?

Greetings
Andrzej Krzywda
